name: ctfreak
description: CTFreak is a self-hosted Task Scheduler and automation platform featuring a clean web UI for running scripts, automating tasks, and building scheduled pipelines without relying on cron or external services. Ideal for developers and teams.
features: Task Automation: Schedule and run scripts without cron complexity. Simplified workflow management.
Clean Web UI: Intuitive interface for managing all tasks. No command-line needed.
Pipeline Building: Chain tasks together for complex workflows. Powerful automation.
No Dependencies: Self-contained solution without external services. Simple deployment.
Developer Friendly: Built for technical teams and automation. Speaks your language.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your automation platform. Your tasks, your server.
